A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Huge disappointment! The plot is extremely weak and predictable with unnecessary cheesy scenes. If you are a fan of Star Wars you will hate this. The movie feels long and by the end of it you are left with a bitter taste in your mouth. \n\nThe  only thing that is worth looking at is the amazing visual effects. The visuals look stunning! I would describe it as going to the top of a mountain to look at the beautiful sceneray \, butt naked at -20 degrees. That's how this movie feels like.
